casebody.data:
COMBUSTION ENGINEERING COMPANY, Inc., Petitioner, v. NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Respondent. No. 7983. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. March 18, 1938. Sizer, Chambliss & Kefauver, of Chattanooga, Tenn., for petitioner. Charles Fahy, of Washington, D. C., for respondent.

Before HICKS and SIMONS, Circuit Judges, and NEVIN, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

The respondent having appeared specially and objected to the jurisdiction of the court to entertain the petition filed by petitioner on March 17, 1938, and the court being of opinion that the objection is well taken, it is ordered and adjudged that the petition be, and the same is, dismissed.
